whyImmux.title: Why Immux
whyImmux.featureImmutableDesc: Immux is built on an immutable database. Histories are retained with time-travelling.

immutable.title: Immutable
immutable.description: Immux is built on an immutable database. Histories are retained with time-travelling.

usable.title: Usable
usable.description: Immux provides straightforward and familiar interfaces. (Currently, it's a Redux.js-like interface. We expect to expand to other paradigms.)

auditable.title: Auditable
auditable.description: All operations to the database are recorded. Every change to every datum can be explained.

managed.title: Managed
managed.description: You write the logic, we manage the servers.
